2024 year in review

Things that happened:

- Ski trips to Colorado, Utah, Whistler 2x, Tahoe
- Eclipse Trip to Austin
- Bachelor party
- Left job at BRINC
- Went to Miami
- Started job at PostHog
- Mykonos trip for work
- Went golfing for first time, loved it
- Chicago boys trip
- Whistler sampler trip
- Odesza last show at gorge
- countless other parties, boat days, golf days, concerts, nights out, nights in
